summary: This memo discusses Lindsey LING and Heinz Theodor WEINER. LING was contacted in Santa Maria, the Azores, by Eloy GUTIERREZ Manoyo and Rafael HERNANDEZ, both Cuban nationals. LING managed a Chinese restaurant in Madrid owned by an unidentified Chinese national who supplied clothing to US personnel. WEINER was arrested in the Azores on suspicion of espionage and was reportedly in Bermuda.
title: LING Lindsey, WEINER Heins Theotor
recipient: Director of Special Investigation, Inspector Genere, USAP
